code: import{getAuth,signOut}from"firebase/auth";var UserSignOut=function UserSignOut(){if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("nittoUser"))!=="out"){localStorage.setItem("nittoUser","out");var auth=getAuth();signOut(auth).then(function(){alert("Sign-out successful.");}).catch(function(error){alert(error);});}else{alert("You are not logged in!");}};export default UserSignOut;
